item.title: Overview
item.description: What linkChanges helps automate code review and enforce team agreements. It validates git diff with simple configuration and CEL scripting language. commit: # Commit message format validation. Example - `TEAM-123: fix something` subject: '(issue): (type)? (title)' values: issue: regexp: TEAM-\d+ check-functions: - message: use separate PRs for fixes and features # Function checks parsed commit types func: 'commits.exists(c, c.type == "fix") && commits.exists(c, c.type == "feat")' - message: page contains draft flag and will not be shown # Function checks changed files and its content func: changes.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Go users link go install github.com/rusinikita/changes/cmd/changes@latest Homebrew users link brew tap rusinikita/tap brew install rusinikita/tap/devex Binaries linkOne line installer link curl -sSfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rusinikita/changes-action/master/changes-binary-install.sh | sh -s -- -b ~/bin latest -b flag - folder to place binary. Leave ~/bin or replace with any folder under $PATH works. latest argument - version to install. Look at releases for specific version. Verify installation link changes help Windows linkOn Windows, you can run the installation commands with Git Bash, which comes with Git for Windows.
